name: DiceSoccer
description:
Controls:

Move: WASD

 Dash: Space

Switch Kick "Style": R (Lob kicks are good for changing die value. Drive kicks slide the dice to maintain the value [most of the time])

Dice and Soccer. Clearly a perfectly, normal combination. The objective is simple, get the dice into the goals. You kick automatically by walking or dashing into the dice. However, the dice need to match the displayed value for it to count (unless it bugs out  :p). 

Game is incomplete, and has some bugs with the physics and scoring, but maybe still enjoyable for a few people as a quick distraction. Originally I wanted to make this into more of a multiplayer/vs. bots game, but that was a bit beyond my ability for this game jam. But hey this was my first, so I'm happy with what I made, and I may work on it some more since I have several ideas for it! Hope you enjoy! :)
